programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 3-4
programme.desc: Episódio 3 - Gran Canaria | Episódio 4 - Tenerife

programme.title: Os Segredos de La Roja – Campeões do Mundo 2010
programme.desc: No dia 11 de julho de 2010, a equipa nacional de Espanha alcançou o seu objetivo de vencer a Copa do Mundo, uma vitória que foi sentida pela equipa e pelo país como um todo. Apesar desse final bem-sucedido, “La Roja” teve que superar várias lutas e dificuldades para se tornar lendário. A equipa chegou à África do Sul com o triunfo do Campeonato Europeu de Futebol de 2008 e Vicente del Bosque a liderar o trajeto. Havia um sentimento geral de favoritismo atribuído a ""La Roja"" e, embora a derrota contra a Suíça no primeiro jogo tenha sido chocante, motivou Del Bosque e a sua equipa a unirem-se e a concentrarem-se com uma única intenção: bom futebol; e um objetivo: fazer história.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: Episódios 1-2
programme.desc: Um Clássico de Futebol | Território Inimigo

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carolina Morace, em Roma, revela-se uma mulher de caráter forte, sem medo de se assumir como pioneira em qualquer domínio, como quando se torna na primeira mulher a marcar quatro golos no estádio de Wembley. Barbara Bonansea, jogadora da Juventus escolhida para a Seleção Mundial da FIFA/FIFPro de 2020, está com a sua família, incluindo a avó, que a apoiou no seu desejo de se tornar futebolista. Benedetta Orsi, jogadora noviça do US Sassuolo, fala com otimismo sobre o modo como ultrapassou a doença que a forçou a desistir do ténis mas lhe deu a oportunidade de desenvolver a sua paixão pelo futebol.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal é uma história sobre vontade, sonhos, determinação, fé, rebelião, coragem e amor. O filme convida-nos a uma jornada pelos diferentes mundos e altamente variados de Sadio - desde a vida rural numa pequena aldeia no extremo sul de Senegal até aos holofotes do futebol mundial jogando pelo Liverpool FC, vencendo as Ligas dos Campeões como número 10 e ganhando a audiência mundial. A Interação de animações, cenas de documentário, um conjunto diversificado de imagens detalhadas e de arquivo dá vida ao passado de Sadio e cria um excitante enredo cheio de emoções.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Megacities é um documentário sobre as favelas de quatro cidades metropolitanas diferentes: Bombaim, Cidade do México, Moscou e Nova York. O filme é um relato em doze episódios sobre pessoas que lutam para sobreviver com desenvoltura, humor e dignidade.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora da Bundesliga e jogadora do AC Milan Julia Simic parte de Nuremberga para apanhar Dafina Redzepi (TSG Hoffenheim) e visitar Bärbel Wohlleben, que tem a honra de ter sido a primeira mulher que marcou um Golo do Mês da ARD Sportschau. Julia mostra-nos o campo de futebol que criou para que as raparigas possam começar a jogar, enquanto Bärbel recorda os seus anos de infância e o modo como a federação alemã de futebol (DFB) baniu as mulheres da prática do futebol profissional. As três irão jogar nas margens do Reno enquanto conversam sobre a paixão que partilham pelo futebol.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: The Peddler
programme.desc: Daniel Burmeister, um cinéfilo de barbas, viaja de terra em terra a realizar filmes de muito baixo orçamento com os autóctones, e em tempo recorde!

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, vencedora da UEFA em sete ocasiões e Jogadora do Ano de 2018 da FIFA, aguarda a chegada de Annie Fortems, uma pioneira do futebol feminino francês, e Sonia Ouchene, uma jovem e promissora jogadora do Stade de Reims, no estádio Olympique Lyonnais. Wendie recorda o início da sua carreira, as suas vitórias e momentos difíceis, como os ataques racistas que sofreu. Annie discorre sobre como a sua geração tornou o futebol feminino francês possível, apesar das ameaças de morte recebidas, enquanto Sonia fala sem rodeios sobre a disparidade salarial entre o futebol feminino e masculino. O encontro das três jogadoras será marcado pela admiração mútua.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Gomera | El Hierro
programme.desc: A viagem continua em La Gomera, com uma primeira prova no frondoso Parque Nacional de Garajonay, onde terão de mostrar como se conseguem orientar às cegas para obter "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. Daí, "saltarão" para o Valle Gran Rey para fazer outro tipo de salto, o salto do pastor, uma técnica utilizada pelos antigos habitantes da ilha para se deslocarem em terrenos montanhosos, que lhes permitirá obter mais "objetos". Tudo o que foi conquistado pelos participantes será posto em jogo na Playa del Inglés, onde a força e a coordenação de cada equipa serão fundamentais no final desta etapa.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: Episódios 3-4
programme.desc: A maldição | Os Vizinhos

programme.title: Ride your Dream
programme.desc: Motociclismo era um mundo de homens, até agora. Este documentário apresenta-nos a Ana Carrasco, a piloto espanhola que revolucionou o mundo das duas rodas e que, desde cedo, teve um sonho claro: ser campeã mundial. Por meio de conversas íntimas com a sua familia e equipa, conhecemos as motivações de Ana, os obstáculos que enfrentou e os sonhos que continua a perseguir. A sua carreira, desde as suas origens numa pequena cidade em Murcia a ser a primeira mulher a vencer um Campeonato do Mundo, é fonte de inspiração para qualquer pessoa.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Tenerife | La Palma
programme.desc: A aventura continua em Tenerife, com uma primeira prova que terá os impressionantes Acantilados de los Gigantes como pano de fundo e um catamarã e uma corrida de estafetas em caiaques como protagonistas para obter o máximo de "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. As equipas poderão obter mais objetos na Candelaria, no seu Conjunto Monumental de los Menceyes e na misteriosa Cueva del Viento. Uma nova surpresa final espera aí pelas equipas...

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: Safety123
programme.desc: Vistos de longe, os Alpes podem parecer uma fantasia pitoresca, mas quem vive no sopé sabe como podem ser ameaçadores.

programme.title: Give Up Tomorrow
programme.desc: Nas Filipinas, um homem inocente enfrenta a pena de morte num polêmico caso de assassinato que separou duas famílias e uma nação inteira.

A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Monsters of Rock Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock- all day! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, U2, The Damned & Billy Idol.

programme.title: 70s v 80s Rock Legends!
programme.desc: 30 hit songs, 15 top rock legends - one track as they were in the 70s, and another in the 80s - simple!

programme.title: 80s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads - all night! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: Gary Davies: 25 Stadium Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Gary Davies: 25 Stadium Anthems!
programme.desc: Get the amps cranked up to 11 as Gary Davies is ready to rock with 2 hours of truly epic tracks! These are the 25 very best bands and artists that became 80s stadium superstars.

programme.title: Monsters of Rock Day!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Monsters of Rock Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock- all day! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, U2, The Damned & Billy Idol.

programme.title: 70s v 80s Rock Legends!
programme.desc: 30 hit songs, 15 top rock legends - one track as they were in the 70s, and another in the 80s - simple!

programme.title: Where Did THAT Come From?! 80-89
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Where Did THAT Come From?! 80-89
programme.desc: These odd songs seemed to come from nowhere, but left a lasting mark - sometimes good, but often quite bad. Watch out for a chorus of frogs, male strippers...oh, and Su Pollard!

programme.title: Did They Think They Could Dance?!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Did They Think They Could Dance?!
programme.desc: From 1980 to 1989, videos full of self belief - but have their moves stood the test of time? You decide as we bring you 30 clips of dodgy dance and suspect swaying from the 80s!

programme.title: WOW Was THIS Their Biggest Seller?
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 WOW Was THIS Their Biggest Seller?
programme.desc: Shocks galore over the next two hours, as we reveal the often-surprising 80s songs that sold the most singles for top stars including Elton John, Madness, ELO, Depeche Mode & more!

programme.title: Who Had The Most Hits in the 80s?
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Who Had The Most Hits in the 80s?
programme.desc: Counting down the 40 acts with more Top 10 hits to their names than any other stars of the decade. U2, Shaky, Queen, Wham & Prince are all here, but who's No.1?

programme.title: Hits That Missed!
programme.desc: Lesser known songs you may have forgotten from artists you'll certainly know!

programme.title: Mark Goodier's 12 inch 80s!
programme.desc: Dancefloor action with 20 extended mixes and king-size videos of 80s classics. From Aztec Camera & A-ha to Queen, Visage & Whitney Houston. Mark Goodier is on the ones & twos!

programme.title: Chart Toppers!
programme.desc: A choice selection of the 191 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1980s!

programme.title: One Hit Wonder No.1s!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 One Hit Wonder No.1s!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of acts that had a single smash hit number 1, then never darkened the top 20 ever again! From Joe Dolce & Kelly Marie in 1980 to Robin Back at the end of the decade.

programme.title: The Heritage Chart 4th Birthday!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Heritage Chart 4th Birthday!
programme.desc: Celebrating the 4th anniversary of the Heritage Chart - Mike Read welcomes a whole host of famous guests to sing their classic hits on TV - one more time!

programme.title: Chart Toppers!
programme.desc: A choice selection of the 191 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1980s!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1987
programme.desc: Jenny Powell flicks through the pages of another Yearbook. 1987 had 'No Limits' on the TV & Stock, Aitken & Waterman cranking an endless stream of massive, catchy hits!

programme.title: 80s - To The Max!
programme.desc: All 80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!

programme.title: 80s Hit After 80s Hit!
programme.desc: Your 80s channel - 24/7!

programme.title: Wake Me Up Before You Go Go!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Wake Me Up Before You Go Go!

programme.title: Only the Biggest 80s Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Only the Biggest 80s Anthems!
programme.desc: All killer - no filler! The anthems that made a decade - from Madonna to Prince, Michael to George, Duran Duran to Pet Shop Boys.

programme.title: 80s Hit After 80s Hit!

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Folk Rock
programme.desc: 2 hours of superbly crafted songs inspired by different regions of the world. Including Simon & Garfunkel, Cat Stevens, James Taylor, Janice Joplin, Bob Dylan & Neil Young.

programme.title: Showaddywaddy's 50s Revival Top 25
programme.desc: They say music goes in cycles - well for a period in the 70s we decided to celebrate all things 50s! Showaddywaddy's Dave Bartram has hits from Alvin Stardust, Mud, Darts & Grease!

programme.title: 1977 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1977!

programme.title: 30 Dead Catchy Choruses!
programme.desc: From disco to rock via Grease & Abba - these are the songs with the 30 biggest singalong hooks of the 70s!

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Folk Rock
programme.desc: 2 hours of superbly crafted songs inspired by different regions of the world. Including Simon & Garfunkel, Cat Stevens, James Taylor, Janice Joplin, Bob Dylan & Neil Young.

programme.title: Bam's Power Hours! 1970-1979
programme.desc: A 10 hour pentathlon of power - a deafening decade of hits! 130 songs to turn up loud, presented by the only man who can - Bam!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Margaret Thatcher became Tory leader, 'Ding A Dong" won Eurovision, and Fawlty Towers opened its doors for the very first time!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Gary Barlow, David Tennant & Clare Balding were born. And the UK said goodbye to pounds, shillings & pence as we went decimal!

programme.title: Tony's Take On 70s Fashion!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Tony's Take On 70s Fashion!
programme.desc: Long considered a 70s style icon himself, Tony Blackburn sails through some sensational fashions - from Elvis & The Partridge Family in 1970 to Squeeze & Gary Newman in 1979!

programme.desc: We're turning our 1964 Ford Flatbed into a shop truck! With the help of the team in Engine Power, the guys make an engine swap that includes a turbo! Plus we're off to the junkyard in search of a transmission.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We do something that has never been done before: build two identical 496 Big Block Chevy engines to run on the dyno...at the SAME TIME!!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: The '69 Road Runner gets an exterior upgrade. We'll show you some unorthodox methods for enhancing a patina paint look.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We upgrade the brakes, repair underside problems, and put some great new off-road and recovery mods on our 2007 Jeep Wrangler JK. Then we'll take it out for a wheeling adventure.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: We start working on a new project with the novice racer in mind. We take a 2008 Ford Crown Vic Police Cruiser and turn it into a budget-friendly Spec Panther racing machine! Today we'll upgrade our transmission for better shifting and give the old power plant a tune-up.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: The Detroit Muscle team begins their journey of bringing a '69 Plymouth Road Runner back from the brink. The first step, upping its ground game.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Our '69 Road Runner, nicknamed Road Burner, gets a big bump in power when we perform a Gen III Hemi engine swap.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We seek more power from our twin-engine dyno setup, by reconfiguring the exhaust and phasing the 496 Big Block Chevy engines. Plus we head to Texas to check out SAM Tech's engine program!

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Today, it's do or die. We connect TWO 496 Big Block Chevy engines to the dyno to find out exactly how much power two of the same engine will make running in tandem!

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: We take a 1989 OBS Chevy C1500 and fabricate truck bed to fit our new custom Oval track rear suspension. Then we head to the paint booth to add a classic paint job.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Tommy and Joel roll an '83 Hurst Olds into the shop and install brakes, wheels, and tires to lay the groundwork for adding some thunder back into this classic lightning shifted street seeker.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Not everybody's got big money to build big power. With that in mind, we turbocharge a bone stock Big Block Ford on the cheap!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Ever wonder how a performance transmission can withstand 800 horsepower? We'll crack the case and show the inner workings. Plus, tradition meets 5000 HP at the granddaddy of all Tractor Pulls!

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: The team ventures to the north Georgia mountains to pick up and test an '07 Jeep Wrangler JK, then we head to the Summit Racing store in search of parts to mod it for extreme off-road fun!

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Backpack Resavska Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia
programme.desc: Natural Living Massage, one of the signature treatments at the Fusion Maia all-inclusive spa resort in Da Nang, Vietnam, is a combination of eastern healing and aromatherapy. Jamie Srubis tries this along with other treatments such as a lymphatic warm bamboo massage, which is good for detoxing, and Mindful Energy, a spa treatment that combines reiki with a head massage session.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Charlie introduces the indigenous handicrafts of Oaxaca, including the whimsical creatures with a unique story.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey in Serbia, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries the locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and the beautiful Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 XP Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: Perhaps the most famous period in Norwegian history was the Viking Age. Far from just barbaric, axe-wielding invaders, the Vikings were Norse seafarers who left a major impact on European history through trade, colonization, and far-flung exploration. During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed Viking ships at a museum, where she comes to know fascinating stories about the lives led by the Vikings.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: From the land of the hallowed Camp Nou stadium to the Catalan capital boasting amazing seafood, Barcelona is a city with many shades to it.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Mexico La Baja
programme.desc: Charlie’s journey across Mexico begins in La Paz, a quiet escape sitting on the Sea of Cortez that is often overshadowed by Cabo.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments built during the Roman, Hungarian and Turkish era.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 City Breaks Bikaner, India
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Barcelona was the canvas of the world-renowned architect, Antoni Gaudi, who branded the city with his fantastical creations.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia. Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai & Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life doesn’t seem to have changed much since the 15th century. On one hand, she gets a taste of luxury at what was once the hunting manor of the royals of Jodhpur, and on the other hand, she loses her heart to the simple ways of life led by the residents of the villages nearby. The highlight of her trip, however, is a surprise that awaits her at an ancient stepwell.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: People flock to Cabo for those perfect beach vacations. Charlie, however, knows a different side to the destination: the action-packed side.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: From dolphin-filled lagoons to colonial charm, Charlie introduces the treasures of the least visited state on the Yucatan peninsula, Campeche.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence
programme.desc: Frieshia spürt den Zauber von Mauritius durch die einzigartige Mischung aus Moderne und Tradition, die das Luxusresort bietet.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: While checking out the art scene of Madrid and enjoying the liveliness at a local market, Alex is engulfed by the energy of this young European city.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: In the historic city of Merida, Charlie shows around the underground pools, which narrate stories of Mayan beliefs.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Heather visits Majdanpek, a city that brings its visitors closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside. Then explores Zajecar town and learns more about the Roman history in Serbia.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Costa Rica Calling Manuel Antonio
programme.desc: In the Manuel Antonio region of Costa Rica, Genevieve’s quest for wildlife leads her from rainforest to ocean.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Alex finds a piece of Africa called Bioparc in Spain’s third largest city, Valencia.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Costa Rica Calling Corcovado
programme.desc: Guided by an irresistible call to adventure, young American traveler, Genevieve Sexton ventures deep into Costa Rica.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis, one of the oldest cities in Europe. Here, she visits a concentration camp built in World War II and later enjoys paragliding wrapping up by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Secret diving spots, under-the-radar lagoons, ancient Mayan ruins – there is a lot more to the Yucatan peninsula than Cancun and Playa del Carmen.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Be it Europe’s largest marine aquarium or a bullfighting ring, Alex finds Spain’s modern elegance and old-world charm meeting in Valencia.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Tulum, one of the last cities built and inhabited by the Mayans; Charlie narrates the stories about their reign.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: Cyprus seduces travelers effortlessly with the charm of a sunny Mediterranean seaside country. When they explore more of it, though, they find the vividly painted Byzantine churches in the Troodos ranges, which reveal the Greek roots of Cyprus. The role it played in human evolution unfolds at the archaeological treasure troves of Khirokitia and Paphos. A tryst with the heritage of Cyprus unravels the stories of one of the oldest civilizations in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 XP Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: Oslo is the oldest of the Scandinavian capitals; with a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, the city’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors. Elisha goes on a tour to see some of them such as the magnificent Arkeshus Castle, a medieval castle that was built to protect Oslo but was used instead as a prison, and Oslo City Hall, the administrative center of the city which hosts the annual Nobel peace prize ceremony.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Backpack Resavska Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey in Serbia, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries the locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and the beautiful Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Pubs in Ireland are much more than a place to drink; they’re an institution. They are social hotspots, centers of cultural gatherings and Irish ‘craic’. Olivia visits the country’s oldest pub in Dublin, the capital city, where she gets to see the love that Irish people have for storytelling. Later on, she goes to the Guinness Storehouse to find out the story behind the dark potion, which is not only the most common beer in Ireland, but also something of a national symbol.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta & JogJakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah begins her backpacking journey in Indonesia from its capital, Jakarta. Understanding the country’s colonial past, she visits Taman Fatahillah and then Sunda Kelapa harbour. Jog Jakarta, popular for the Borobudur temple is her next stop where she also visits the Batik embroidery factory, ending with a joyride on a bling-bling car and visit to Malioboro street.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Christina is in Frankfurt and receives light shower rains.She decides to beat the rains and head out to one of the smaller towns.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Mexico El Tule
programme.desc: Charlie shows the best ways to navigate the vibrant culinary scene of Mexico’s gastronomic capital, Oaxaca.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo & Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah wraps up from Jog Jakarta after her visit to Sultan’s palace and heads to East Java’s capital, Bromo, for a thrilling experience of watching an active volcano. Keeping the adrenalin on, she visits Komodo National Park for sighting the world’s largest reptile - Komodo Dragon.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: The west coast of Ireland, once considered the end of the known world, is the most magical part of this storied island. Olivia embarks on a journey along the scenic coastal route called the Wild Atlantic Way, to explore the savage beauty of this craggy coastline with its dramatic sea cliffs, windswept beaches and bucolic hamlets. Along the way she stops at Burren, a stony moonscape of karst, where she sees the rugged Cliffs of Moher at the edge of the ceaselessly churning Atlantic.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Famed for its rugged landscapes and glistening lakes, Connemara is one of Ireland’s most romantic regions. On a trip to this rocky wilderness, Olivia visits some of its postcard-perfect castles. At the idyllic Ballynahinch Castle, she gets to experience the perfect blend of history, luxury and countryside beauty. She also finds herself deeply moved by the love story that gave rise to Kylemore Abbey, a mesmerizing castle that looks like the last page of a fairytale book.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo & Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah's tryst with Komodo dragons continues as she visits the Komodo island. Exploring its beaches, she ends her day after snorkelling at the Pink beach. Further exploring Labuan Bajo she visits the Mello village to witness the cultural Caci dance and learn about the Manggarai Culture.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico
programme.desc: From the Aztec reign to the Mexican Revolution, the capital of Mexico offers a glimpse into different periods of its history.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Hannah in her final leg of her backpacking journey in Indonesia, explores the island’s beautiful temples and wraps up her day with a traditional dinner. Next morning she visits the turtle island where learns about its conservation and tries parasailing. Her trip concludes with an unforgettable experience of undersea walking.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccan Chronicles Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: In April 1912, the RMS Titanic set sail on her maiden voyage to New York City and tragically sank in the North Atlantic Ocean after hitting an iceberg. Over 100 years later, the proud people of Belfast continue to honor the memory of their “Queen of the Ocean” through their fantastic exhibition, the Titanic Belfast. Olivia visits this unmissable multimedia extravaganza that makes the story of the world’s most famous ocean liner come alive for her.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Apart from being a tropical paradise with turquoise waters, coral reefs and white sandy beaches, Mauritius is home to many natural wonders. During Freishia’s visit, she is spellbound by the magnificent Chamarel Falls, which is the highest waterfall of the island, and the surreal psychedelic dunes known as the seven coloured earth of Chamarel.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By The Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Valletta and Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccan Chronicles Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: Be it stave churches, Viking villages or dramatic fjords, Norway’s marvelous heritage reveals its rich history.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kissed By The Sea Comino, Malta
programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys her time at Popeye Village.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Freishia catches the adventure bug on her trip to Mauritius, which leads her to go kite surfing at the gorgeous Le Morne beach. Hungry for more, she goes to Casela Park, a nature reserve where she takes a walk with the big cats of the jungle. An exhilarating zip-line ride through the St. Felix sugar estate makes her realize that these adventures don’t just offer an adrenaline rush but also an exciting new way to appreciate the beauty of Mauritius.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Spas Kumarakom Lake
programme.desc: Located on the tranquil banks of Vembanad Lake, Kumarakom Lake Resort is enveloped by nature and recognized as one of the best luxury resorts.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccan Chronicles Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccan Chronicles Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Pristine beaches, coral reefs and indigenous forests, which are home to rare wildlife – nature truly takes center stage in Mauritius. Freishia’s explorations of this natural wonderland of a country lead her to a nature reserve, which was once used for growing vanilla, but is now a breeding park for Nile river crocodiles.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo Island, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi take a romantic trip to AlUla, where they are drawn to traditional Arab hospitality and the mysteries of an ancient kingdom.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Pubs in Ireland are much more than a place to drink; they’re an institution. They are social hotspots, centers of cultural gatherings and Irish ‘craic’. Olivia visits the country’s oldest pub in Dublin, the capital city, where she gets to see the love that Irish people have for storytelling. Later on, she goes to the Guinness Storehouse to find out the story behind the dark potion, which is not only the most common beer in Ireland, but also something of a national symbol.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Christina is in Frankfurt and receives light shower rains.She decides to beat the rains and head out to one of the smaller towns.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta & JogJakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah begins her backpacking journey in Indonesia from its capital, Jakarta. Understanding the country’s colonial past, she visits Taman Fatahillah and then Sunda Kelapa harbour. Jog Jakarta, popular for the Borobudur temple is her next stop where she also visits the Batik embroidery factory, ending with a joyride on a bling-bling car and visit to Malioboro street.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Mexico El Tule
programme.desc: Charlie shows the best ways to navigate the vibrant culinary scene of Mexico’s gastronomic capital, Oaxaca.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: The west coast of Ireland, once considered the end of the known world, is the most magical part of this storied island. Olivia embarks on a journey along the scenic coastal route called the Wild Atlantic Way, to explore the savage beauty of this craggy coastline with its dramatic sea cliffs, windswept beaches and bucolic hamlets. Along the way she stops at Burren, a stony moonscape of karst, where she sees the rugged Cliffs of Moher at the edge of the ceaselessly churning Atlantic.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo & Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah wraps up from Jog Jakarta after her visit to Sultan’s palace and heads to East Java’s capital, Bromo, for a thrilling experience of watching an active volcano. Keeping the adrenalin on, she visits Komodo National Park for sighting the world’s largest reptile - Komodo Dragon.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo & Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah's tryst with Komodo dragons continues as she visits the Komodo island. Exploring its beaches, she ends her day after snorkelling at the Pink beach. Further exploring Labuan Bajo she visits the Mello village to witness the cultural Caci dance and learn about the Manggarai Culture.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico
programme.desc: From the Aztec reign to the Mexican Revolution, the capital of Mexico offers a glimpse into different periods of its history.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Famed for its rugged landscapes and glistening lakes, Connemara is one of Ireland’s most romantic regions. On a trip to this rocky wilderness, Olivia visits some of its postcard-perfect castles. At the idyllic Ballynahinch Castle, she gets to experience the perfect blend of history, luxury and countryside beauty. She also finds herself deeply moved by the love story that gave rise to Kylemore Abbey, a mesmerizing castle that looks like the last page of a fairytale book.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccan Chronicles Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Hannah in her final leg of her backpacking journey in Indonesia, explores the island’s beautiful temples and wraps up her day with a traditional dinner. Next morning she visits the turtle island where learns about its conservation and tries parasailing. Her trip concludes with an unforgettable experience of undersea walking.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: In April 1912, the RMS Titanic set sail on her maiden voyage to New York City and tragically sank in the North Atlantic Ocean after hitting an iceberg. Over 100 years later, the proud people of Belfast continue to honor the memory of their “Queen of the Ocean” through their fantastic exhibition, the Titanic Belfast. Olivia visits this unmissable multimedia extravaganza that makes the story of the world’s most famous ocean liner come alive for her.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By The Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Valletta and Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccan Chronicles Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: Be it stave churches, Viking villages or dramatic fjords, Norway’s marvelous heritage reveals its rich history.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Apart from being a tropical paradise with turquoise waters, coral reefs and white sandy beaches, Mauritius is home to many natural wonders. During Freishia’s visit, she is spellbound by the magnificent Chamarel Falls, which is the highest waterfall of the island, and the surreal psychedelic dunes known as the seven coloured earth of Chamarel.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Spas Kumarakom Lake
programme.desc: Located on the tranquil banks of Vembanad Lake, Kumarakom Lake Resort is enveloped by nature and recognized as one of the best luxury resorts.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Freishia catches the adventure bug on her trip to Mauritius, which leads her to go kite surfing at the gorgeous Le Morne beach. Hungry for more, she goes to Casela Park, a nature reserve where she takes a walk with the big cats of the jungle. An exhilarating zip-line ride through the St. Felix sugar estate makes her realize that these adventures don’t just offer an adrenaline rush but also an exciting new way to appreciate the beauty of Mauritius.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kissed By The Sea Comino, Malta
programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys her time at Popeye Village.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccan Chronicles Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccan Chronicles Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo Island, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Pristine beaches, coral reefs and indigenous forests, which are home to rare wildlife – nature truly takes center stage in Mauritius. Freishia’s explorations of this natural wonderland of a country lead her to a nature reserve, which was once used for growing vanilla, but is now a breeding park for Nile river crocodiles.

programme.title: Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi take a romantic trip to AlUla, where they are drawn to traditional Arab hospitality and the mysteries of an ancient kingdom.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Audi R8 GT, a model that the car manufacturer built only 333 units of, in everyday situations. In addition, taking a look at the Mazda MX5 roadster and Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Audi A6 2.0 TDI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Wiesmann MF5.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Volkswagon creates a special car for the 24 hour race at Nuerburgring.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also, a look at the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, a car that was once the Formula 1 safety car, and BMW's 6 series models.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Jaguar XF-S is supposed to put pressure on BMW, Audi and co. in the business class segment. With V6 power, 380 HP output and all-wheel drive it wants to teach the German top dogs the true meaning of the word fear.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: BMW offers the X2 as a compact hipster SUV for young people; the DS 7 Crossback wants to convey the French lifestyle; Jaguar's E-Pace enters the market as a smaller version of the F-Pace.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: There are SUV models that have proven themselves, such as the Range Rover. The British manufacturer wants to reach an even broader audience and introduces a small Rangy: the Velar.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: With 3.5 million units sold worldwide, the Mercedes Sprinter is one of the most popular commercial vehicles. Now in its third generation, it is more modern than ever.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Porsche exits the diesel business. Hybrids such as the Cayenne E-Hybrid are expected to become more important.4x4 tests if the Cayenne E-Hybrid really just consumes 3.2-litres on average. Plus: 4x4 goes on a tour with the BMW X4.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the Porsche 550 RS Spyder and the Audi Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: High tech turbo cars from the 80's get together at the SalzburgRing.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Le Jog classic car rally in Europe.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: At the Nürburgring in Germany, with DTM legends Bernd Schneider and Ellen Lohr.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type and the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A restored 300 SL prepares to race at the Mille Miglia classic car rally.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the world's most spectacular motor races in the world. Watched by a huge number of people, this motorsports event doesn't fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The German Rally Championship has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. That's why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In 1954, Mercedes returns to the Grand Prix circuit after 20 years of abstinence.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late 1950s in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. These small cars were seen on tracks until the end of the 1970s, but their heritage would live on through an association known as Historic Formula V Europe.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew at BSG Racing is familiar with spectacular conversions. Dirk Hattenhauer and his boys have already refined a lot of cars and now they perform a special project, as they want to refurbish an old Opel Kadett C Coupe.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A lot of work, attention to detail and passion is packed into a tuned show car. But it might take some time until a car like this is ready to stand on its own four wheels.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing.

programme.title: Tuning

programme.desc: Valley Uprising is the riveting, unforgettable tale of the bold rock climbing tradition in Yosemite National Park: half a century of struggle against the laws of gravity -- and the laws of the land.

programme.title: BMX Nigeria
programme.desc: BMX pioneers KK Money and S-King lead us through the streets of Lagos, Nigeria, to illustrate the difference riding bikes has made to their lives and what their hopes are for the sport in their town.

programme.title: Castles in the Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Castles in the Sky
programme.desc: Filmed in five countries over three years, Castles in the Sky delves into the heart of the locations while the surfers travel through them with a sense of open-minded awe.

programme.title: Highlights – Qatar Major Premier Padel
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Highlights – Qatar Major Premier Padel
programme.desc: Enjoy highlights of the second Premier Padel stop of the 2024 season in Doha, the Qatar Major.

programme.title: Raibu Katayama vs Torgeir Bergrem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Raibu Katayama vs Torgeir Bergrem
programme.desc: Norwegian powerhouse Torgeir Bergrem and Japanese juggernaut Raibu Katayama go head-to-head in Myoko, Japan, for a chance to qualify for Revelstoke and stake their claim in snowboarding history.

programme.title: Red Gerard vs Austen Sweetin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Gerard vs Austen Sweetin
programme.desc: The Froth Goblin vs The Golden Boy: Washington’s Austen Sweetin and Colorado’s Red Gerard face off at Scarp Ridge. Both riders possess style and power to make this one hell of a head-to-head.

programme.title: Sebbe De Buck vs Kevin Backstrom
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Sebbe De Buck vs Kevin Backstrom
programme.desc: Belgium’s Sebbe De Buck and Sweden’s Kevin Backstrom face off in Andermatt, Switzerland. Which of the Beyond Medal’s brightest stars will earn the chance to advance to the big event in Revelstoke in Canada?

programme.title: Spencer O’Brien vs Mary Rand
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spencer O’Brien vs Mary Rand
programme.desc: Two of backcountry riding’s finest, Spencer O’Brien and Mary Rand, face off on Mount Kirkup. One of them will advance on to Revelstoke for a shot at taking the biggest win of their careers.

programme.title: Jamie Anderson vs Emma Crosby
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jamie Anderson vs Emma Crosby
programme.desc: With a renowned snowboarding contest career, Jamie Anderson will ride in a head-to-head battle against one of snowboarding’s most promising rising stars, Emma Crosby, at Colorado’s Crested Butte Mountain Resort.

programme.title: Nils Mindnich vs Victor Daviet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Nils Mindnich vs Victor Daviet
programme.desc: With their signature riding styles and approaches to natural terrain, Nils Mindnich and Victor Daviet go head-to-head to try and lock down one of six open spots and move on to Revelstoke.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny assembles a surf super-team with Kelly Slater and Carissa Moore for the Backdoor Shootout at Pipeline, then competes in the first running of The Eddie since 2016 at XXL Waimea Bay.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny chases his big wave dream of a title at The Eddie before switching gears to compete against the World Tour’s finest surfers in a high-performance battle down the beach at the Sunset Pro.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny takes off on a 24-hour strike mission for a tow swell in Tahiti and pushes the limits of what’s possible on a surfboard (and on a hydrofoil) for the world’s most innovative waterman.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: With big wave season ending in Hawaii, Kai Lenny chases a new challenge in Alaska where he meets up with snowboarding icon Travis Rice to learn how to take his surfing to the next level (on snow).

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Big wave champion, ultimate waterman and now a married father of twin girls – Kai Lenny's balancing act looks different in 2023, where his home life and performance goals are ready to reset.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny kicks off the big wave season at Jaws, facing the risks that come with his pursuit of progression, then Maui water safety bands together after fires ravage the town of Lahaina.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny surfs the same swell at both Jaws and Mavericks, then confronts the risks vs rewards of big wave surfing after suffering a serious injury at Pipeline, the most dangerous wave in the world.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Surf brothers Kai and Ridge Lenny relive their epic XXL wave ride at Maui's Jaws surf spot, and Kai lets us go BTS to take a look at his state-of-the-art surf equipment testing.

programme.title: More than a Dive
programme.desc: As the tension builds towards the last stop of the 2023 season, divers bring their A-game with a display of breathtaking dives. Mostar offers an awe-inspiring challenge to jump off a historic bridge.

programme.desc: Hosts Rob Warner, Emily Batty and Eliot Jackson talk with Lewis Kirkwood (Gracey Hemstreet's mechanic), Benjamin 'Benno' Willeit (Specialized's team manager) and Les Gets DH winner Benoît Coulanges.

programme.title: Driving La Carrera: Rally Brothers
programme.desc: The world’s greatest auto races fuel every driver’s passion for competition and adventure. But one race offers something more. La Carrera Panamericana unites competitors unlike any other race. This unity is the Spirit of La Carrera. This spirit gave birth to the documentary “Driving La Carrera, Rally Brother.” Two brothers, Chris and Jeff Mason, find out that racing in the Carrera Panamericana is more than just winning.

programme.title: Adventure Bike
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 Adventure Bike: Episode 4: Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT
programme.desc: Clare gets to ride the Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT, but do it's retro rally looks match the engine? Tales from the Trails has the lads get the sidecar onto the Trans Euro Trail, before visiting a race track. Graham talks about his Bromance with his motorcycling inspiration, and Sam starts his rally dream with a build and roadbook training, which doesn't go to plan.

programme.title: FIA Karting
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E05 FIA Karting: Round 5: Kristianstad
programme.desc: The much-loved 1221m Åsum Ring circuit, will host this major event in an ideal setting for spectacular battles. The many international competitions that have taken place at Kristianstad over the last few years bode well for a top-quality event in the heart of Skåne, close to Denmark.

programme.title: David Hobbs: Racer and commentator

programme.title: More Banned F1 Tech
programme.desc: More Banned F1 Tech

programme.title: Carbon Fibre vs Liveries - What F1 Needs to Bring Colour Back
programme.desc: F1's 2024 season may have kicked off, but during the pre-season events, bare carbon fibre kept catching our eyes. It was an interesting novelty a few years ago, but in 2024, fans are missing the bright, colourful paint schemes of previous years. To understand more, Jon Noble chatted with Mark Turner, Co-Founder and CEO of Silverstone Paint Technology, who works with the majority of the F1 grid, to find out more.

programme.title: 2024 Hail International Rally - Full Review
programme.desc: The Hail International Rally has entered its fifth year on the agenda of the 2024 FIA World Rally Championship. The first round of the Saudi Toyota Championship was hosted on February 8-10, 2024, in the city of Hail.

programme.title: Rally Raid: W2RC Season 2 Full Review - 2023

programme.title: WEC
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E01 Aston Martin's Hypercar: Back in Top Class Endurance Racing
programme.desc: It's true - Aston Martin is officially set to race in WEC & IMSA with its Hypercar Prototype, based on the Aston Martin Valkyrie AMR Pro race car, with The Hearts of Racing team. But with their recent successes in F1, will they be fighting for wins and championships in Endurance Racing? What are the tech specifics about their machinery? And who will drive for the team? Martyn Lee chats with Autosport's Sportscar guru Gary Watkins to find out all the info.

But with their recent successes in F1, will they be fighting for wins and championships in Endurance Racing? What are the tech specifics about their machinery? And who will drive for the team? Martyn Lee chats with Autosport's Sportscar guru Gary Watkins to find out all the info.

programme.title: The F1 Connection
programme.desc: The F1 Connection: News and analysis from the top racing series in the world.

programme.title: Adventure Bike
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 Adventure Bike: Episode 4: Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT
programme.desc: Clare gets to ride the Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT, but do it's retro rally looks match the engine? Tales from the Trails has the lads get the sidecar onto the Trans Euro Trail, before visiting a race track. Graham talks about his Bromance with his motorcycling inspiration, and Sam starts his rally dream with a build and roadbook training, which doesn't go to plan.

programme.title: FIA Karting
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E05 FIA Karting: Round 5: Kristianstad
programme.desc: The much-loved 1221m Åsum Ring circuit, will host this major event in an ideal setting for spectacular battles. The many international competitions that have taken place at Kristianstad over the last few years bode well for a top-quality event in the heart of Skåne, close to Denmark.

programme.title: David Hobbs: Racer and commentator
programme.desc: David Hobbs, the subject of this Windsor Interview, is much more than just a former racing driver who won on a multitude of different circuits throughout the world in a wide variety of machinery.

programme.title: More Banned F1 Tech
programme.desc: More Banned F1 Tech

programme.title: Carbon Fibre vs Liveries - What F1 Needs to Bring Colour Back
programme.desc: F1's 2024 season may have kicked off, but during the pre-season events, bare carbon fibre kept catching our eyes. It was an interesting novelty a few years ago, but in 2024, fans are missing the bright, colourful paint schemes of previous years. To understand more, Jon Noble chatted with Mark Turner, Co-Founder and CEO of Silverstone Paint Technology, who works with the majority of the F1 grid, to find out more.

programme.desc: The Hail International Rally has entered its fifth year on the agenda of the 2024 FIA World Rally Championship. The first round of the Saudi Toyota Championship was hosted on February 8-10, 2024, in the city of Hail.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren vierten Stopp in Fieberbrunn, Österreich - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Teil des FWT-Finales findet in Fieberbrunn statt, wo die Athleten den imposanten Wildseeloder bezwingen müssen. Dieser Berg ist selbst für die erfahrensten Profis ein echter Härtetest und die Athleten werden sicherlich alles geben müssen.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2023 - Bangkok (THA)
programme.desc: Das etablierte innerstädtische Leichtathletikspektakel, die Golden Fly Series 2023, kehrte nach seinem ersten Auftritt in Phuket im Jahr 2021 nach Thailand zurück und fand in der Hauptstadt des Landes, Bangkok, statt.

programme.title: Gold Coast Marathon 2024
programme.desc: Gold Coast Marathon 2024

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2023 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: Das ABSA Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt aufstrebende Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus aller Welt über 648 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Season Recap
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihr großes Finale in Xtreme Verbier, Schweiz - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt!

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2022
programme.desc: The Golden Roof Challenge has great tradition being hosted in Innsbruck: The pole vault and long jump event will take place once more: the world elite of these sports have been invited to create a unique atmosphere and a thrilling contest.

programme.title: Best of Mountain Trail Running
programme.desc: It’s the longest, toughest and highest one-stage trail race in the Alps: Swiss Irontrail demands a great deal of the participants through Graubünden’s unique mountain scenery.

programme.title: Biggest Peak Project I
programme.desc: 200 years after the first ascent of Jungfrau summit (SUI); 150 years of Mammut, Europe’s biggest mountaineering outfitter and 100 years of Jungfraubahn – a “structure of the century”.

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: Between Home

programme.title: Cape Pioneer Trek 2019 - Südafrika
programme.desc: The Cape Pioneer Trek, is one of the highlights of the international mountain biking calendar. It is one of the most anticipated mountain biking races of the year, with over 250 cycling teams of two taking part in the now 7 day stage race.

programme.title: Winter Games 2019 - Ski & SNB Halfpipe Cardrona (NZL)
programme.desc: The Winter Games New Zealand is an annual elite international winter sports event, attracting the world’s best athletes.
