programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air World Championships 2022
programme.desc: In todays episode we´re going on another trip with our favorite Kite Sport Athletes. This time we are heading to Tarifa in Spain for the World first Big Air World Championships in several disciplines.

programme.title: King of the Court Crown Series 2022 - Hamburg (GER)
programme.desc: The King of the Court Crown Series 2022 will be unprecedented. Five tournaments, a total of four continents visited and millions of fans from all over the globe that can experience the best beach volleyball action ever seen!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Tignes & Val d’Isère (FRA)
programme.desc: As the second stop of the 2022 E-Bike World Tour, the UCI-accredited E-Tour de Haute-Tarentaise attracted professional and experienced amateur riders from different nations for two days of sublime stage racing across 85km of high alpine terrain.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2022 (ROU)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally was created in 2004 and takes place for the 19th time this year. The race is spread over five days, the first being the inner-city prologue in front of thousands of enthusiastic fans.

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023
programme.desc: Die ITF Beach Tennis World Tour Sand Series Classics 2023 startet am 18. und 19. März mit ihrer ersten Station in Réunion (FRA). Beachtennis ist eine schnell wachsende Sportart und eine Kombination aus Tennis, Beachvolleyball und Badminton.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2023 - Best of WOMEN
programme.desc: Das ABSA Cape Epic ist das wichtigste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen der Welt. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt durch 648 ungezähmte Kilometer unberührter Landschaften und 15 475 Höhenmeter.

programme.title: Gritty in Mexico City - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: Urbanes MTB-Abenteuer mit Hans Rey & Rob Warner - Düster in Mexiko-StadtRob Warner erkundet zusammen mit Hans Rey Mexiko-Stadt auf dem E-Bike und durchquert die Mega-Metropole in 5 Tagen auf höchstem Niveau.

programme.title: GKA Magazine #1 Freestyle-Kite World Cup
programme.desc: Der Qatar Airways GKA startet in seine neue Saison 2023 mit dem Auftakt in Fuwairit, Katar und dem zweiten Stopp in Salinas Del Rey, Kolumbien. Wir werden einige spektakuläre Wasser-Action mit spektakulären Tricks und unglaublichen Flugzeiten sehen.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: FAI World Drone Racing Championship Grand Final - Ningbo (CHN)
programme.desc: Managing speeds of up to 180 km/h, dealing with highest precision and maintaining full concentration. These are the key skills to become Drone Racing World Champion.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: 4Islands MTB Croatia
programme.desc: Das 4Islands MTB Croatia begrüßte über 400 Mountainbiker aus aller Welt zu einem fünftägigen Rennen auf vier kroatischen Inseln. Das Rennen führt über 291 km mit 6150 Höhenmetern und ist einzigartig, da die Fahrer auf dem Deck eines schwimmenden Bootes starten.

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #01
programme.desc: Vodafone Queen & King of the Court wird seine Crown Series 2023 in Miami Beach, Florida, USA, starten. Die größten Stars des Beach-Volleyballs werden vom 9. bis 12. März 2023 anwesend sein.

programme.title: Enfer & Paradis
programme.desc: Justine Dupont is on her way to be the world's best female surfer. Enfer & Paradis accompanies her in her everyday life as well as on the biggest wave in the world - Nazaré and offers insights behind the scenes of the first mixed surfing world championship.

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Kayak + Climbing
programme.desc: 1. Two mountaineers explore the “Place of Happiness”. Their goal is to climb the highest Monolith in Brazil in a one-day push. 2. Some of the world´s best kayakers gather for the descent of the Stikine River - the “Everest of whitewater”.

programme.title: Xtreme Verbier - 20-jähriges Jubiläum - Teil 1
programme.desc: Verbier – for many years one of the premiere off-piste locations in the world and home of the legendary final ofthe Freeride World Tour, the “Xtreme Verbier” has celebrated its 20th anniversary.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The 2022 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in ist 15th season in January - as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! Right at the beginning a brand-new stop in Baqueira Beret (ESP) awaits the athletes.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: 5 Peaks Project
programme.desc: Famed Swiss mountain-runner Andreas Steindl (26) set a stunning new record: he ran up five four-thousand-metre peaks within 7 hours and 45 minutes – his kind of a perfect “nine-to-five” day in his “alpine office”.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: The 2022 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in ist 15th season in January – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! Right at the beginning a brand-new stop in Baqueira Beret (ESP) awaits the athletes.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

Bulgarias own, Stoyan Koprivlenski, will face off with Romanian Sorin Caliniuc. Also fighting is Heavyweight Levi Rigters and Luis Tavares makes his return.

Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The man behind "Punk'd" takes on the wings of death and covers a wide gamut of topics from Diddy stories and court side shenanigans to biochemistry and Elon Musk.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Zac Efron takes on the wings of death with Sean Evans, channeling Shia LaBeouf as he pops bottles of hot sauce along the way. From throwback basketball tricks to paparazzi advice from Leonardo DiCaprio, this episode has it all!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: DeVine takes on the wings of death in the first-ever "Hot Ones" Fourth of July special. Along the way, he channels Macho Man Randy Savage, discusses his hilarious "Pitch Perfect" audition and explains why his dad hung up on Joe Biden.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Half-Cajun, half-Jewish star Shia LaBeouf battles the brand new "Hot Ones" lineup and discusses everything from wrestling with Tom Hardy to giving Kanye West his "Indiana Jones" hat.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Florence Pugh is an Academy Award-nominated actor with an ever-growing list of acclaimed performances, from "Lady MacBeth" to "Little Women" and many more. But can she take on the spice?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Jenna Ortega is a Golden Globe-nominated actor you know from the massive global Netflix hit "Wednesday."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Australian superstar Jacob Elordi takes on the wings of death and discusses the influence of Marlon Brando, sitting courtside at MSG with Simu Liu and rock-bottom auditions.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Tom Holland began his career at 12 years old and he's now one of Hollywood's biggest box office draws.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: John Boyega is an actor-producer from films like "Attack the Block," "Pacific Rim: Uprising" and "Star Wars."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Bob Saget became a household name on the classic sitcom Full House as well as a legend on the standup stage.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The King of Queens tries to become the King of Hot Sauce while talking about everything from UFC fandom to Hitch lore to the preeminence of Long Island pizza.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The multitalented actor and former physician Ken Jeong faces off against the wings of death. Jeong dispels common medical myths, discusses encounters with NBA legends like Shaq and Kevin Durant and even gives Sean a free check-up.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Wanda Sykes battles the wings of death with Sean Evans, discussing everything from the White House Correspondents' Dinners to her first meeting with Larry David along the way.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Chelsea Handler battles the wings of death with Sean Evans and discusses dogs, thirst traps, 50 Cent and so much more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: This time, Pharoah dives deeper into his comedy career, summons characters like Joe Rogan and Nic Cage to the table and delivers some of the hottest bars in rap history.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Ramy Youssef is a Golden Globe Award-winning actor, writer and comedian best known for his lead role in "Ramy," the Emmy-nominated and Peabody Award-winning comedy series.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: "The Black Paul Rudd" takes on the fish sticks of death and talks about everything from appearing on WrestleMania to selling t-shirts to Andre 3000 to how the "Hot Ones" sketch came together.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Davidson offers behind-the-scenes "SNL" stories, talks about walking in an Alexander Wang fashion show and gives a ringing endorsement for "Uncut Gems" and Adam Sandler's basketball skills.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Seth Meyers is one of the longest tenured cast members on "SNL" and host of "Late Night with Seth Meyers."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: James Corden is the Emmy-winning host of "The Late Late Show with James Corden."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Sean Evans asks one of his broadcasting idols, Jimmy Kimmel, about everything from the enduring influence of David Letterman and Howard Stern to favorite all-time pranks.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: As he ducks and weaves through the barrage of heavyweight hot sauces, Offset breaks down his cereal obsession, explains how Ellen helped him buy a new Bentley truck and unleashes some iconic ad libs.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The L.A.-bred emcee discusses his love of golf and his favorite shabby-shabu restaurant. As the Scovilles crank, the hat comes off, the sweats starts pouring and Schoolboy earns respect for YG and Sean Evans.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The hometown hero takes on the wings of death in front of a live audience. Along the way, Juice WRLD talks about his dirt-bike obsession, the appeal of Percy Jackson novels and the reason you shouldn't pigeonhole SoundCloud rappers.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Chicago native battles the wings of death and discusses everything from Kanye West's latest evolution to the relationship between rap and the Chicago White Sox. Will he finally ditch his independent roots and sign to the "Hot Ones" label?
